name: Cardiology
Description: Treatment packages for diseases and abnormalities of the heart

name: General Surgery
Description: Treatment packages for injuries or disorders of the body by operation

name: Obstetrics
Description: Treatment packages for childbirth and female health related issues

name: Nephrology
Description: Treatment packages for kidney and urinary tract related ailments

name: ENT
Description: Treatment packages for ear , nose and throat related issues

name: Orthopaedics
Description: Treatment packages for  bones or muscles

name: Vascular Surgery
Description: Treatment packages for diseases of arteries and veins
